title: D604 AI CarBox
metaDesc: Powerful D604 AI CarBox MDVR for centralized fleet video surveillance and intelligent data processing.
fullDescription: The D604 AI CarBox is a powerful Mobile Digital Video Recorder (MDVR) that serves as the central hub for vehicle surveillance. It supports up to 8 channels of high-definition video input and uses advanced AI processing to analyze road conditions and driver behavior locally.
features: Supports HDD/SSD + SD Card dual storage for massive capacity
Integration with fuel, temperature, and door sensors
packaging: 1x D604 MDVR, 1x Power Harness, 1x I/O Cable, 1x GPS Antenna, 1x 4G Antenna
